protocol.text: The perfect match data were normalized by using the SuperNORM data service (Skylight Biotech Inc., Akita, Japan) according to a three-parameter lognormal distribution model. ID_REF =  VALUE = parametric: z-score of logarithms
Aerial parts of the seedlings were harvested 2 weeks after germination.
Seeds were germinated and the seedlings were grown aseptically on solid 1/2MS media plus 1% sucrose at 22C under long-day (16 h light / 8 h darkness) photoperiodic conditions.
Guanidinium thiocyanate extraction of total RNA followed by spin column purification was performed using NucleoSpin RNA II (Macherey-Nagel).
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 250 nanograms of total RNA using GeneChip 3' IVT Express Kit (Affymetrix).

Following fragmentation, 15 micrograms of cRNA were hybridized for 16 h at 45C on ATH1 microarrays (Affymetrix) in the Affymetrix GeneChip hybridization oven. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G.
